name: JAYA Ceylon Handmade Premium Green Tea (Loose Leaf)
description: Pure Etoya Excellence. Experience the unique terroir of Etoya through our artisanal Green Tea. From the tenderest handpicked buds to your cup, enjoy a refreshing symphony of flavor and fine craftsmanship. Elevate your daily ritual with the handpicked purity.

name: JAYA Ceylon Handmade Black Tea Bags (20PCS)
description: Conveniently Brewed. Bring the luxury of the JAYA Ceylon to your cup. Our tea bags contain the same hand-plucked, master-crafted tea as our whole-leaf collection, offering a rich and robust infusion for the modern connoisseur. Enjoy the uncompromising quality of artisanal craftsmanship in every delicate, high-grade fragment.

name: JAYA Ceylon Handmade Premium Black Tea (Loose Leaf)
description: Experience the Art of Single-Origin Tea. Hand-crafted in the lush gardens of Etoya, Ratnapura, our tea is meticulously handpicked and artisanal-dried to preserve its unique terroir. Indulge in a symphony of flavor and time-honored craftsmanship in every sip.

name: JAYA Ceylon Handmade Black Tea (Fannings)
description: Small Leaf, Big Flavor. Our Handmade Fannings deliver the same pristine Etoya terroir as our whole-leaf tea, but with an intensified, faster-steeping finish. This bold blend offers a rich, malty awakening for those who appreciate a stronger, more traditional cup of tea.

name: JAYA Ceylon Handmade Cinnamon Tea Bags (20PCS)
description: The Spirit of Ceylon in Every Sip. Ignite your senses with JAYA Ceylon’s signature blend: premium Etoya tea leaves infused with real authentic Ceylon cinnamon bark. No artificial flavors—just the bold, aromatic warmth of the "Golden Spice." A sophisticated, all-natural ritual designed for those who value health, heritage, and flavor.

name: JAYA Ceylon Handmade Ginger Tea Bags (20PCS)
description: A Zesty Awakening. Experience the raw power of nature with JAYA Ceylon’s signature Ginger blend. We combine premium, handpicked Etoya tea with real, crushed Ceylon ginger —no additives, just pure vitality. This 100% natural brew offers a spirited, aromatic journey that honors your health and the rich traditions of Sri Lankan soil.

name: JAYA Ceylon Handmade Green Tea Bags (20PCS)
description: Vibrant Flavor. Modern Convenience. Bring the purity of the Etoya gardens to your cup with JAYA Ceylon’s Handmade Green Tea Bags. Meticulously hand-crafted from the supple buds of sun-drenched Ratnapura, this antioxidant-rich blend offers a life-affirming flavor profile and a crisp, clean finish for your daily wellness journey.

name: JAYA Ceylon Handmade Coffee 500g
description: Pure Ceylon Coffee. Single-Origin Excellence. A rich, soulful blend crafted from premium beans hand-harvested in Ratnapura. Meticulously processed and small-batch roasted to ensure a sophisticated depth of flavor, our coffee is 100% natural and free from enhancers. Discover the essence of the purity in every aromatic sip.

name: Handmade Cocount Oil 1L
description: Traditionally crafted from carefully selected coconuts, this pure handmade coconut oil adds natural flavor and goodness to your cooking.

name: Handmade Cocount Oil 675ml
description: Traditionally crafted from carefully selected coconuts, this pure handmade coconut oil adds natural flavor and goodness to your cooking.

name: Achcharu(Pickle) 375g
description: Achcharu(Pickle) is a handmade food brand bringing you the true taste of traditional achcharu. Prepared using fresh ingredients, authentic spices, and time-tested recipes, our achcharu is made with care to deliver bold flavor and real quality..

name: Butter Cake 1kg
description: At Teeny Treats, we bake soft, rich, and buttery cakes made with love and the finest ingredients. Our butter cakes are freshly baked to give you a home-style taste, perfect texture, and comforting aroma in every slice.

name: Chocolate Cake 1kg
description: At Teeny Treats, our chocolate cakes are baked to satisfy true chocolate lovers. Made with quality cocoa, fresh ingredients, and lots of care, each cake is soft, moist, and deeply chocolatey..

name: Date Cake 1kg
description: Teeny Treats Date Cake is a rich, moist cake made with natural dates and carefully selected ingredients. Slow-baked to bring out deep flavor and softness, this cake offers a perfect balance of sweetness and warmth in every bite.

name: Chocolate Muffin
description: Our Chocolate Muffins are soft, fluffy, and packed with rich chocolate flavor. Baked fresh using quality ingredients, each muffin is perfectly moist and delicious — just right for a quick snack or sweet treat.

name: Snake Bite Hot Sauce
description: Hotzy is a tropical pineapple-based hot sauce made with fiery Scotch bonnet peppers, delivering a perfectly balanced mild heat (Level 2) and bold flavor. Crafted with all-natural ingredients and free from MSG, artificial flavors, colors, and gluten, it’s a clean and wholesome choice. Perfect for pizza, rice dishes, BBQ, burgers, noodles, and more—Hotzy adds a fresh kick that elevates every bite.

name: Scorpion Sting Hot Sauce
description: A delicious blend of fresh, juicy mangoes and Scotch bonnet peppers, offering a gentle heat (Level 1) with rich tropical flavor. Made from an authentic, plant-based recipe with no MSG, artificial colors, or flavors—and completely gluten-free. Perfect for pizza, salads, dosa, roti, and everyday meals, this sauce adds a bright, flavorful twist without overpowering your taste buds.

name: Papaya Twist Jam
description: Made with fresh papaya and a touch of zesty lime, Papaya Twist Jam delivers a naturally sweet and refreshing flavor in every spoonful. Crafted with real ingredients and no artificial colors or flavors, it’s a wholesome choice for everyday enjoyment. Perfect on toast, in desserts, or straight from the jar—pure, natural goodness you can taste.

name: Pineapple Bliss Jam
description: A tropical delight made with fresh pineapple and aromatic Ceylon cinnamon, delivering a perfectly balanced sweet and warm flavor. Crafted with real ingredients and no artificial colors or flavors, this jam offers pure, natural goodness in every spoonful. Perfect for toast, desserts, or as a simple treat—Pineapple Bliss brings a taste of paradise to your day.

name: Passion Fashion Jam
description: A bold fusion of tangy passion fruit and fiery Scotch Bonnet peppers, bringing a perfect balance of sweet, fruity flavor and vibrant heat. Made with real ingredients and no artificial colors or flavors, this jam delivers pure, natural goodness with a tropical kick. Ideal for toast, cheese boards, BBQ glazes, or adding a spicy twist to your favorite dishes.
